remarks: The scalar injection function in a subring algebra is the same up to a restriction to the subring.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 4-Jul-2015.)
statement:
subrg1ascl.p $e |- P = ( Poly1 ` R ) $.
subrg1ascl.a $e |- A = ( algSc ` P ) $.
subrg1ascl.h $e |- H = ( R |`s T ) $.
subrg1ascl.u $e |- U = ( Poly1 ` H ) $.
subrg1ascl.r $e |- ( ph -> T e. ( SubRing ` R ) ) $.
subrg1ascl.c $e |- C = ( algSc ` U ) $.
subrg1ascl $p |- ( ph -> C = ( A |` T ) ) $.
